data: In the event of any suspected hypersensitivity and drug and / or Infusion related reactions  STOP infusion, notify provider STAT
First Line for Anaphylaxis - Maximum epinephrine 0.5 mg/dose IM
0.01 mg/kg, IM, as q5min, PRN anaphylaxis, order duration: 3 doses or times, drug form: inj
1 mg/kg, PO, once, PRN itching or rash, drug form: oral liq
